value.title: How do you conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI Report?
value.excerpt: There are different interactions Power BI visuals can have, but how do we conditionally highlight a bar in a Power BI report using a slicer? Patrick shows you some MAGIC to get this to work.  Question from Live Stream: https://youtu.be/hS4hZdNZ8vw?t=1009  Phil Seamark's Blog: https://dax.tips/  Edit

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. value.title: Power BI Tutorial | From Flat File To Data Model
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to load data from a flat file to the data model. This could be a text, csv or excel file with a lot of columns. value.title: What is this delta lake thing?

Connect with Stijn https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  What is Delta Lake https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-what-is-delta-lake

value.title: Power BI DAX   Previous Month to Date, Quarter to Date, and Year to Date Calculations
value.excerpt: If you want to compare the sales up to a particular day and compare it with the previous period (month, quarter, or year) but up to that particular day in that period, then it is called previous month-to-date, previous quarter-to-date, and previous year-to-date. These calculations can be more helpful
